item.content:encoded: A signed copy of the Beatles' album Sgt Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band sold at auction for $290500 on Saturday The final sale price far exceeded the $30000 originally estimated for the item and broke the previous record for similar sales The UK Parlophone copy of the album with high gloss...

item.content:encoded: WINNER OF THE WEEK Tyler Perry Sure the multi-hyphenate didn't score Easter weekend's top debut; that prize went as expected to GI Joe Retaliation which opened with an estimated $412 million It didn't even finish second; that honor went to last week's family animated comedy hit The Croods which earned another estimated...
